name: jupyter-matlab-proxy-e2e
description: End-to-end tests of jupyter-matlab-proxy using Playwright.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npx playwright test
scripts.start: npm run start-jlab && npm run print-jlab-url
scripts.print-jlab-url: echo "JupyterLab URLs:"; sleep 1; grep -oP 'ServerApp]\s*http[s]?://[^ ]+' ./jupyterlab.log || echo "Error: No JupyterLab url found, please check log file ./jupyterlab.log"
